channel.title: Projects on James Lloyd
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on James Lloyd

item.title: Weather Station
item.description: Data from the weather station in my garden. I have an old CCTV camera taking pictures of the sky every 5 minutes. I’m then autogenerating the webm of the previous days sky as timelapse. My Weather Website the data is also posted to Wundergound

item.title: 2StateReviews.com
item.description: I have built 2statereviews.com with Darren Watt. The site is based on Darrens long time Film reccomendation system which has only 2 states See! or Dont See!. Simplicity at its best, the site allows you to search for films and vote See, Dont See for them, warning though its quite addictive. The site is currently 80% feature complete ( this figure changes constantly as we make up new features).

item.title: PHP Active Directory Search
item.description: Just add the fully qualified domain name of your domain controller (host), the domain dn ( if your domain was beanz.meanz.heinz.com for example your dn would be DC=beanz,DC=meanz,DC=heinz,DC=com ) supply the username and password of a user in your domain, this user does not need to be a member of any group, as long as the account isn’t disabled. Then your off!You can add active directory attributes to the $search_fields array to change what you can search on You can add which active directory attributes are displayed in the result by adding to the $return_fields array
